item.description:
Hey all,

If anyone wants to to go out to a restaurant (or something else) on another night too, please email me or post on the message board, write the location, date and time, and we'll see who comes!
R
--------
General information:

We need more Organizers to help the group meet more often!
Please email the organizer if you'd like to help or suggest a meeting.

-If there is something you'd like to practice, please bring it, or suggest an activity.

-If you arrive before 6:30 and don't see anyone else, please tell the Information Desk that you are there for the Meetup and where you are sitting, so they can tell them to join you. This is NOT a regular BPL ESL group! Please choose a table and welcome everyone as we arrive.
If everyone prefers, we can meet for one hour and then go get supper somewhere.

We usually meet at 6:30p, in the BPL, at the tables to the left of the information booth in the middle of the new building (Boylston Street) lobby, first floor. We may not have a sign so please look for people seated at the tables near the entrance. If you get there first, smile so we can find you! It is NOT a regular Library ESL group fyi.
---------

If you don't find the group, you can ask the Information Desk for the 6:30p Meetup Group for English Conversation. It is NOT a regular BPL English group!

For more information, see http://www.bpl.org...

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston English as a Second Language May Meetup
